Description:

1954 Alcatraz - point-n-click adventure, which is set in San Francisco 50s. The protagonist of the game, Joe was sentenced to 40 years in prison for armed robbery and is now planning to escape from Alcatraz. But he needs the help of his wife, Christine, who, unfortunately, had its own problems in San Francisco. Their familiar ganster Mickey threatens Christine death if she refused to give him the prey of her husband. But where the loot is hidden? Only Joe knows the answer to this question, and while he was behind bars, almost everyone on the North Shore is looking for the jackpot.


--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
